item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, October 16, 2024 at 3:25 AM UTC
item.description:

2. Show HN: Graphite, a Blender-inspired 2D procedural design Rust app (154 points | 30 comments)
3. The C23 edition of Modern C (339 points | 163 comments)
4. Show HN: I built the most over-engineered Deal With It emoji generator (594 points | 118 comments)

6. Correct eye contact in videos by redirecting the eyes to look at the camera (17 points | 19 comments)
7. Show HN: I 3D scanned the tunnels inside the Maya Pyramid Temples at Copan (251 points | 61 comments)
8. Asterinas: OS kernel written in Rust and providing Linux-compatible ABI (183 points | 70 comments)

10. FreeBSD/EC2 boot performance over time (35 points | 23 comments)

12. Apple introduces iPad mini built for Apple Intelligence (191 points | 303 comments)

14. Internet Archive Services are "temporarily offline" (48 points | 3 comments)

19. Try to fix it one level deeper (41 points | 26 comments)
20. Man who scammed country out of $130M using mobile game facing 89,000 years (23 points | 14 comments)

23. Zep AI (YC W24) Is Hiring AI Engineers and Dev Advocates ( | hide)

29. Web Browser Engineering (2021) (662 points | 111 comments)
